summary: The friendship between two Arizona dirt bike racers is tested when they both lust for an attractive runaway young woman who joins them on the racing circuit.
cast: Robert Redford|Michael J. Pollard|Lauren Hutton|Noah Beery Jr.|Lucille Benson|Ray Ballard|Linda Gaye Scott|Erin O'Reilly|Ben Archibek|Sharmagne Leland-St. John|Erick Vinther|Beverly Yissar
title: El precio del fracaso
